message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I'm not quite ready to go to $130, but I can do $140. That's the lowest I can go.
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $135 again?
I've already offered you $135 in our previous round, and I'm not willing to go back to that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $135, so I'll offer it to you for $137.50.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $136?
I've already met you halfway between $137.50 and $136, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to sell it to you for $137, that's the best I can do.
